Module com.jhr2122.unit5.finalactivity

Package com.jhr2122.unit5.finalactivity

package com.jhr2122.unit5.finalactivity
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BooksEntity
    POJO of book.
    DatabaseManager
    This class interacts with the PostgreSql database.
    LendingEntity
    POJO of lending.
    LibraryApplication
    This class launches the main application
    LibraryController
    This is the controller of the main application, it manages the view and interaction while it makes calls to the database manager and spring manager methods when needed.
    ListviewController
    This class manages de modal window opened by the main library controller to select a book-user matching the search pattern during the lending-returning operations.
    ReservationsEntity
    POJO of reservations.
    SpringManager
    This class will manage the http requests thrown to spring concerning reservations.
    UsersEntity
    POJO of users.
